TextAsset.value: Al wanted me to meet him on the roof...?
For now, I must disappear mysteriously!
All he did was go out the door
(Hmm, there’s something more to Al than his good looks and charm. I better get to the bottom of it…)
(I dunno, hanging out on the roof sounds a pretty lame way to skip class and risk getting caught!)
(There’s more to that guy than his good looks and charm. I better get to the bottom of it…)
(I dunno, he’s a little strange. Even for a Namco High student!)
Could I tag along with you today?
Could I tag along with you today?
Oh... Um... Hahahaha! I don't know ${slot:playerName}.
(She'll definitely be a good influence on me!)
(And I have to admit, her nervous laughter is making me wonder... )
I have to practice for the school play, though. Do you mind?
No problem, ${slot:playerName}! We've all got a lot to do. Hahahaha!
Hahahahaha… what are you talking about, ${slot:playerName}?
Hey Anti-Bravo. Want to head over to Poetry Club?
S-sure... It's not like I have... dark deeds... to do.
Sure… humans hang out to become close to one another. So obviously we should… run away from each other! Let’s race!
Join Blue Max at the cafe today?
Hey ${slot:playerName}! I hope you can join me at the cafe later. Y’know. To talk about SECRET stuff.
So, I’ll see you at the cafe, okay?
Sounds a little risky, but I’m in!
I dunno, Max. I’ll think about it, okay?
I dunno, Max. I’ll think about it, okay?
Sounds a little risky, but okay.
No, Wait I wanted to talk to someone…
Yeah, Please just let this day be over.
Now if you keep this up maybe one day you’ll get to leave.
(Everyone seems so restless, I wonder what they’re planning to do today?)
(Everyone else wants to escape or ignore their problems here...)
(...I don’t want to do that. I want to learn something from what I did.)
(...Sneaking out to work on their projects, or sneaking out after other students.)
(I’m going to sit here, follow the rules, and learn something from all this.)
(Well, time’s up and I’m the ONLY one here.)
(As soon as King or Dig Dug show up I’ll head home.)
(Those other students are going to get into so much trouble.)
Yes, sir. I’m the only one here.
That you’d try to cover for all these delinquents!
Attempting to cover for all their escapes!
All the problems they’ve caused, the fights, damages…
You’re trying to make friends by covering for their delinquency, but all you’re going to get is -
(I can't believe this is happening... all I did was try to follow the rules...
but maybe... the rules are wrong...
Maybe I need to look inside myself for the answers.)
Maybe there's someone easier to understand around here.
Let's see who else is around to hang out with.
I don’t think I’ve seen you look quite so sad before.
Just that my life is like, totally OVER.
(I can’t really tell how serious this is…)
I could really use, like, a good friend to talk to…
${slot:playerName}… will you hang out with me today?
So, will you hang out with me today?
I like, really need a friend right now…
Continue to coyly suggest Galaga Ship should rehearse with you!
Forget about Drama Club, Galaga ship is unapproachable!
${slot:playerName}! Do you think you can help me rehearse?
(OH! Is Galaga Ship completely dazzled by my charm? I’ll have to dial it back a bit.)
I was thinking, maybe, uh, not doing that.
Not sure it’d make a difference either way.
(Man, whatever. This school just isn't ready for my different take!)
Don’t know how I’m gonna get these lines down in time.
I was thinkin’, maybe, y’know. I could help out?
I have to collect more data... But you can come along, if you like.
Hey Hiromi! Can I hang out with you today?
I have to collect more data... But you can come along, if you like.
Still need help collecting that data?
(I’m going to pretend that was an invitation, I guess… )
I'm not too sure about this.
Hi Jane! Have you figured out what we’re doing today?
Hoo hoo! As a matter of fact, I have! :B
However, I need you to give your consent first…
It’s going to involve something kind of… devious!
Here, lean in close so I can whisper…
${slot:playerName}, we’re going to sneak out of detention!
What do you say? I know it’s not the sort of thing you usually get up to…
You seem like such a practical girl!
Is this really something you’d want to try?
Am I really that practical, though?
I mean, you already know me as a dedicated trickster and gutsy gumshoe…
And besides, my journalistic integrity matters more to me than any school rules.
It wouldn’t be any fun if you didn’t join me. :B
I wouldn’t want to dilute your journalistic integrity.
Listen, in a minute I’m going to get up and leave the room.
Nobody pays attention, they won’t notice.
Wait a few minutes, and then get up and leave too.
I’ll meet you in the hallway.
So you do want to hang out with me?
What happened to “I’ll just disappoint you”?
Is she waiting for me to go after her still?)
Tag along with Meowkie to monitor the halls today?
Let’s see what else is going on before I decide.
Trust her. She will open up when she’s ready to.
Force it out of her. She won’t grow without your help.
Hiya Boss! Got any plans for today?
Uh… just sitting in detention, I guess.
That was pretty dumb of me to ask, wasn’t it?
Haha, what? Come on, Meowkie, don’t worry about that.
Well, I was gonna patrol the halls today…
Seeing as I’m the lead Hall Monitor and all.
I thought maybe… you might wanna tag along with me?
Only if you want to, of course!
Ya know, see how a real pro like me does it!
(It’s pretty cute how excited she gets about hall monitoring.)
It was probably a dumb idea anyway…
B-but please don’t feel obligated, of course…
I’ve gotta go get him to come to his senses.
If I leave I might get in trouble too...
Mr. Driller… You can’t sit still today, can you?
It’s just that… I’m really jonesing to go digging!
It hasn’t been THAT long, has it?
Hey ${slot:playerName}… If we went digging today...
What do you think we’d find?!
Oh man! Do you really think so?!
I’m gonna go out drilling RIGHT NOW!
He’s gonna get in trouble for skipping out of detention…
(Mr Driller already ran out of class...
he could get into more trouble if someone doesn't follow him.)
Well... I was just wondering if you were coming to Magic Club today!
Well... I was just wondering if you were coming to Magic Club today!
${slot:playerName}... I don't mean to be rude...
But your puns really trivialize the seriousness of Magic Club.
Or maybe they show that you're comfortable with the subject?
Every morning I try to... exorcise in the park...
I brought a sandwitch and tabooli for lunch...
When I'm scared I check my horrorscope...
Maybe you're right... Maybe this subject requires a certain level of....... dignity.
Let's just go to the library...
Join Richard on his crackdown stakeout thing?
Join Richard on his crackdown stakeout thing afterall?
I’ll need help tracking him down.
The point is, you’re the only person I almost trust.
Richard, you ever think that maybe this stuff you think is completely crazy?
I’d revisit that line of thought!
I knew you’d change your mind. It’s in your psych profile.
In spite of the psych profile.
Yup. It said you’d say that too.
What’s the rent like in Crazy Town?
Extreme sarcasm isn’t in your psych profile...
Hey Cuz! Wanna come sit with me for detention today?
How can you say no to this face?!
Not only do you get a primo view of my super hot bod if you sit with me…
I also gotta feeling some exciting stuff is gonna go down today.
(He’s got kind of a mischievous glint in his eyes…
Maybe it’d be better to keep an eye on him.
And besides, it might actually be pretty fun to hang out with him…)
C’mon, Cuz, you know you want to!
(I actually kinda do want to, but he doesn’t need to know that.)
Meet with Terezi out on the grounds?
(Okay, let’s see what’s in my desk…
Hopefully nothing that will kill me.)
Huh. It seems to be a crudely drawn picture of me…
It says “H3y Cotton C4ndy, 1s th1s you.”
1S TH4T R34LLY WH4T YOU TH1NK MY VO1C3 SOUNDS L1K3? >:/
Sorry. I’m not so good at doing voices.
“PL34S3 COM3 M33T M3 OUTS1D3 ON TH3 SCHOOL GROUNDS”?
1 C4N’T B3L13V3 1T! 1T’S L1K3 LOOK1NG 1NTO ON3 OF YOUR HUM4N “M1RRORS”
OR WH4T3V3R TH3 SOUND V3RS1ON OF 4 M1RROR 1S
I don’t think there’s such thing as a “human sound mirror”.
SO 4NYW4Y! WH4T DO YOU S4Y, COTTON C4NDY?
But we’re in the middle of detention!
If I’d have known this is what she meant…
I wouldn’t have agreed to this!
I really don’t want to see what happens when I don’t keep a promise to Terezi Pyrope.
I could really use some help.
Help Tomari, it's worked out great so far!
I could use another pair of eyes on the research material I compiled. What do you say, ${slot:playerName}?
Not bad, ${slot:playerName}! But it’ll be better once you’re helping!
Uh. Yeah. Me and the helping.
Lemme get back to you on that one.
I could use another pair of eyes on the research material I compiled. What do you say, ${slot:playerName}?
(Hmmm, well. I bet he’ll want to do the hard stuff himself anyway. I can help out here and there. Sure!)
Oh, uh, yeah. That’d be great.
It might take me awhile to get there though. A LONG, LONG WHILE.
You, um, get started without me.
Hey cutie! Ready for some pwnage on the roof?
Come up to the roof with me!
Sure, why not. Nothing can possibly go wrong.
I'm more comfortable with the prying eyes, thanks.
Hey cutie! Ready for some pwnage on the roof?
I'll give you a hint... It involves rigorous physical activity!
(AH! She grabbed my hand! She's pulling me along... I can't escape!)
(Though I'm not sure I want to... )
Yeah, maybe we should wait til it's dark out...
Yes you! Whatcha been up to, cutie?
Um... Not much. Just... Hanging out. You know.
I want to try something out, but it's gotta be away from prying eyes.
Come up to the roof with me!
(AH! She grabbed my hand! She's pulling me along... I can't escape!)
I'm more comfortable with the prying eyes, thanks.
Suit yourself. If you're gonna change your mind, do it quick... I'm not gonna be here forever.
Gonna come up to the roof with me, cutie?
